message:
Good morning people,
I want to share with you something happened that I was part of, I posted a job ad that someone has sent me, a young man contacted me if he could apply for an unpaid internship at this entity since they need people who use the same stack of technologies. I put both of them in contact and then what happened  was really shocking for me. That young man seeking the internship called me to tell me that the company would require him to pay for that internship (13000+ EGP). 
Since I never encountered a situation like this, I am really shocked and disgusted. I wish to ask your opinions about what happened, and should I remove the job post or not ?

data.message: Unfortunately, internships that are paid for by the intern are not uncommon, but that number is *huge*.
